mapper.select: select date_format(detail.achieve_time,'%w') as `week`,count(detail.achieve_time) as `num` from life_user_target_detail as detail inner join life_user_target as target on target.target_id = detail.target_id where target.user_id = #{userId} and detail.achieve_time is not null group by `week`

select target.target_classify_name as `name`,sum(detail.course_duration) as `min` from life_user_target_detail as detail inner join life_user_target as target on target.target_id = detail.target_id where target.user_id = #{userId} and detail.achieve_time is not null group by detail.target_id

select target_detail.target_detail_id as targetDetailId, target_detail.target_detail_classify_id as targetDetailClassifyId, target_detail.target_detail_classify_name as targetDetailClassifyName, target_detail.course_duration as courseDuration, target_detail.achieve_time as achieveTime, target_detail.target_id as targetId, classify.img as classifyImg from life_user_target_detail as target_detail inner join life_course_classify as classify on target_detail.target_detail_classify_id = classify.course_classify_id where target_detail.target_id = #{targetId}
